com.intel.ispplib.connection.device

Interface IBleConnectionCallBack


  • public interface IBleConnectionCallBack
    Callback, registered by the application, to get status about the ble connection

    • Method Summary

      Callback for connection status change (connect (...), disconect(...), pair(...), unpair(...))

      • onStatusChanged

        void onStatusChanged(IBleConnection.CONNECTION_STATUS connectionStatus,
                   IBleConnection.GATT_STATUS gattStatusatus)
        Callback for connection status change (connect (...), disconect(...), pair(...), unpair(...))
        Parameters:
        connectionStatus - The status, see IBleConnection.CONNECTION_STATUS
        gattStatusatus - The returned gatt status

      • onCharacteristicRead

        void onCharacteristicRead(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic,
                        IBleConnection.GATT_STATUS status)
        Callback corresponding to readCharacteristic(...)
        Parameters:
        characteristic - The characteristic that has been read
        status - The gatt status, see IBleConnection.GATT_STATUS

      • onCharacteristicChanged

        void onCharacteristicChanged(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic,
                           IBleConnection.GATT_STATUS status)
        Callback corresponding to a characteristic notification from the ble connection
        Parameters:
        characteristic - the characteristic that has been updated
        status - The gatt status, see IBleConnection.GATT_STATUS

      • onCharacteristicWrite

        void onCharacteristicWrite(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic,
                         IBleConnection.GATT_STATUS status)
        Callback corresponding to writeCharacteristic(...)
        Parameters:
        characteristic - The characteristic that has been written
        status - The gatt status, see IBleConnection.GATT_STATUS

      • onCharacteristicSubscribe

        void onCharacteristicSubscribe(BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic,
                             IBleConnection.GATT_STATUS status,
                             boolean subscribed)
        Callback corresponding to subscribeToCharacteristic(...)
        Parameters:
        characteristic - the characteristic
        status - The gatt status, see IBleConnection.GATT_STATUS
        subscribed - boolean indicating whether notifications are enabled

        void onServicesDiscovered(java.util.List<BluetoothGattService> services,

        Parameters:
        services - The list of discovered services
        status - The gatt status, see IBleConnection.GATT_STATUS
